advancement.ancientspellcraft\\:ancient_: Craft an Ancient Spell Book at the Scribing Table
advancement.ancientspellcraft\\:relic_re: Research a Stone Tablet with the Sphere of Cognizance
advancement.ancientspellcraft\\:root.des: A new chapter in the wizard's journey
config.ancientspellcraft.loot_injection_: List of loot tables to inject Ancient Spellcraft loot (as specified in loot_tables/chests/dungeon_additions.json) into.
entity.ancientspellcraft\\:fire_ant.name: Fire Ant
gui.ancientspellcraft\\:ancient_knowledg: Your knowledge of ancient magic increased by %s
gui.ancientspellcraft\\:sphere_cognizanc: You've already researched this relic
In your hands you hold the key to change the world around you
Make the world you canvas and alter it to your will
What was once this shall now be that
Nothing will stay as it is forever. You might as well speed it up
Extreme raw power emanates from the archaic scripture
You may have found one of the oldest magic texts ever recorded
The spell seems to be extremely different from anything you have ever seen
The magic in this manual seems incredibly sophisticated but also complex
The book appears to be barely held together by the magic flowing through it
You almost feel like the book is studying you as much as it is you
Strangely the weight of the tome seems to exceed that of the materials it was crafted from
Studying the relic has given you some insights about the art of ancient magic
Studying the relic has given you some insights about the art of ancient magic
By examining the glyphs have you gained some insights of ancient magic
The magical properties of the relic have long faded into the past, but the Magic Crystals renewed their power
For a brief moment you felt like the symbols in the relic glowed
The book is based around a force field, that only the caster may pass through
For a wizard security is key, yet does not require them
This magic seems to be applicable to any container
The detailed incantation seems to fulfill a security function of sorts
Sometimes a good offence is the best defense
No opponent shall stand against this magics might
Nothing is more devastating than spells created to harm
This spell, as many others, is intended to cause damage on anything it is cast on
Harness this spells power to enhance your abilities
Concentrate the power within you
Your body shall grow more powerful with this magic
This spell is focused on exceeding the limits of the human body
Creation is true power, such as this spell
Use this spellbook to twist the fabric of reality and create new matter
This tome describes a way to shape something from nothing
You wield a codex of conjuration before you!
Carry this magick as your aegis...
This spell was constructed to prevent harm
Study this spellbook to protect yourself from danger
The book describes ways to shield yourself from your opposition
The books encryption was excruciatingly thorough, but you found the dispel incantation scribbled down... %s
With a final adjustment to the crystalline matrix the sphere is able to recognize the spells name... %s
After a while the buzzing sphere goes silent, it was finally able to decipher the tomes script... %s
Accessing the spheres archives you are finally able to translate the writing, and understand it at last - %s
The arcane amanuensis calls his magical composition %s
Ignoring the unreadable text, you are able to follow the pictograms and thus fathom the spells function which proved to be %s
Turning to your encyclopedias for advice you are struck by a sudden realization: this must be %s
The scripts design leads the sphere to concurring it being from wizards of the north, successfully translating it: %s
You realise the book seems to have been widely contributed once, you find a translation in your sphere, %s.
You find out you held the book the wrong way and read the title as: %s
This spell seems to draw its power from the very land you inhabit
The author of this work found ways to use earth and wind for his endeavors
The spellbook carries information on many poisons
This tome is based on the magic of life itself
This may have been written by a disciple of acheron, son of helios and demeter.
The more you try to decipher the script the harder it seems to become
The sphere could not find anything helping you identify the spell
After a while you give up trying to read and just look at the pictures
You finish the tome having successfully drawn a mustache on every face you could find
You cant help but doze off every second line due to the awful writing
The script appears to be made obscure by some protective magic, rendering translation difficult
You experience unnatural dyslexia when looking at the books pages.
Your translation efforts are met with little success.
Nothing you can do seems to be capable of breaking the arcane encryption.. Still some premonition keeps you from giving up.
Flicker little flame, scorch char and maim
These texts shall allow you to conjure fire
A great Pyromancer was the author of this text
The spellbook is adorned with flames
The text itself seems to emit heat
On the cover of the tome, the name of Phlegethon stands, warning all of the scalding flood.
The spell seems to be in large parts based on a healing spell, yet it does not seem capable of regenerating its caster
The manuscript focuses on concentrating a beam with a regenerative effect
Those who keep their friends in good health will live longer themselves
It is not just always you that requires fixing...
There is no wound to deep, no injury to great that can't be mended
Cleansing magic can be found within these pages
A paladin once wrote these lines
The writer of this text has sworn upon the names of Panaceia and Asclepius.
Coldness shall be your adversaries demise
The heavy pages are rather cold to the touch
The "Codex of frost" is written on the cover
These kinds of spells are rumored to have caused an ice age once
The book is aimed at teaching you the ways of the Cryomancers
As glittering light shines upon the covers of the tome, the name cocytus gleams up.
Be careful not to electrocute yourself with that!
Feel the current running through the script you hold
Thunder and lightning shall be your tool or weapon
Shockingly these text concern themselves with harnessing electricity
True warlocks know, not every problem can be solved alone
Nothing will stand in the way of your summons!
Sheer numbers is a power of its own
These texts devise a way to support you with servants
Dark secrets are enclosed in these texts
The book is written in the language of the dead
This is the work of an ancient necromancer
This tome might hold the secrets to corruption or resurrection
Even the sphere can barely take out the stygian letters of this tenebrous text.
The scripture contains an extract on the various uses of the magic from food preparation to ore processing
As you experiment with the spell your pockets seem to heat up
The author explains how his perilous and lengthy waiting in front of his furnace lead to this spell
For a wizard, well done is nothing but a magic trick
This charm will act across great distances
This spell shall be the arrow that defeats your foe
The described spell shall function at range
The cunning warriors stay at range
A wizard spend his whole life in pain developing this spell as his salvation
Only through light may corruption be cleansed
This spell seeks to dispel the eternal
Curses last forever, until they don't
To cheat death is a power only one has achieved...
There is a legend of a wizard so powerful.. He could save others from dying
The tome suggests death is not permanent, at least in theory
This spell seems to reverse death, but not yours...
The giant book is cramped full of complicated spell advice little of which seems to be from experience
This book might contain illusionary magics
Within this codex ways to conjure, deceive and outsmart are described
This is a manual focused on the arts of pure magic
The ways of the trickster are before you
This tome contains knowledge of the mystical ways in the wake of circe.
Nothing you can do seems to be capable of breaking the arcane encryption.. Still some remonition keeps you from giving up.
This tome might prove as an useful tool
This spell will help you make a task less tedious
With the right tool everything can be easy
This spell was devised as a tool
There is nothing that spells can't solve
You already know this item
Requires something to research
Requires Magic Crystals
Research
Requires %s Magic Crystals
item.ancientspellcraft\\:amulet_arcane_c: Transmutating spells always results in the same element as the spell being transmuted
item.ancientspellcraft\\:amulet_curse_wa: Grants immunity to all Curse Spells.
item.ancientspellcraft\\:amulet_healing_: Occassionally grows some Healing Mushrooms near you when you are injured
item.ancientspellcraft\\:amulet_pendant_: No bound spell - bind a spell at an Arcane Workbench. \u00A74The process consumes the book!
Bind it to a spell at an Arcane Workbench. \u00A74The process consumes the book!
The Pendant of Eternity will recast a chosen Buff spell forever if you have a wand on your hotbar with the spell bound to it.
item.ancientspellcraft\\:amulet_poison_r: Grants an 50%% chance to be immune to poisoning.
item.ancientspellcraft\\:amulet_power.de: Grants +10%% spell potency for all spells, but increases mana costs by 10%%
item.ancientspellcraft\\:amulet_rabbit.d: Grants a 25%% chance to trigger a Speed buff when being hurt (grants weakness).
item.ancientspellcraft\\:amulet_shield.d: Grants a Wizard Shield effect when you are hurt (3 minutes cooldown)
item.ancientspellcraft\\:amulet_time_kno: Your Time Knot loop resets immediately if you die while wearing this amulet
item.ancientspellcraft\\:ancient_mana_fl: Seems to have a rune carved into it
item.ancientspellcraft\\:astral_diamond_: An Astral Diamond can be charged with the Essence Extraction Ancient spell, by destroying an Imbuement Altar
item.ancientspellcraft\\:bartering_scrol: The scroll created a signal beacon of light, a wandering wizard might notice it soon...
This scroll can create a magical beacon which will attract wandering wizards who can trade with you
Failed to cast the scroll, try again elsewhere
This scroll only works if you can see the sky
No wizard has answered your request for trading. Perhaps try later or elsewhere
item.ancientspellcraft\\:belt.generic.de: Equip this belt in the Baubles inventory or by placing it on your hotbar if you don't have Baubles. Only one belt may be equipped at a time.
Increases the duration of Buff spells by 20%%
item.ancientspellcraft\\:belt_horse.desc: Casting Horse Whistle while riding a horse causes a short gallop
item.ancientspellcraft\\:belt_horse.name: Equestrian Belt
item.ancientspellcraft\\:belt_stone.desc: Smashing the ground with Stone Fist creates a small earthquake
item.ancientspellcraft\\:belt_stone.name: Belt of Stone
item.ancientspellcraft\\:belt_vortex.des: Reduces the damage of Mana Vortex to greatly empower its explosion
item.ancientspellcraft\\:blank_rune.name: Blank Rune
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_bucket_co: This magically enchanted bucket refills itself with coal daily
You search through the bucket but it was empty..
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_burrow.de: The burrow spell can dig through stone
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_cryostasi: Grants a 25%% chance to activate Cryostasis when critically wounded
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_earth_orb: Active Ability: Shaking the orb releases a cataclysmic earthquake
Increases Earth spell Potency by %1$s%%, reduces other element's spell Potency by 50%%
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_elemental: A collection of magical practices about elemental manipulation. Grants +10%% bonus spell potency for Fire, Ice and Lightning spells
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_enchanted: Slowly repairs and imbues your wizard robes with mana while they are in the magical pocket of Attire Alteration
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_evergrowi: These magical crystals are constantly growing by accumulating ambient magic, chipping it can grant a random crystal
The crystal is too small to chip off a piece of it..
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_fabrikato: This equipment which once belonged to a powerful artificer allows you to always transmute artefacts into Charms or Headgear. Armour upgrade items always transmute into Resplendent Thread
Active Ability: Conjures a violent firestorm
Increases Fire spell Potency by %1$s%%, reduces other element's spell Potency by 50%%
This magically enhanced coin bag refills itself with 3-8 gold nuggets each day
You search through the bag but it was empty..
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_healing_o: Active Ability: Raising up the orb shields its holder and blinds nearby enemies
Increases Healing spell Potency by %1$s%%, reduces other element's spell Potency by 50%%
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_ice_cream: This book contains various Ice Cream recipes
Frozen Tome of the Popsicle Prestidigitator
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_ice_orb.d: Active Ability: Freeze the world around you
Increases Ice spell Potency by %1$s%%, reduces other element's spell Potency by 50%%
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_knowledge: Wand progression experience from casting spells with master wands is transferred to other hotbar non-master wands
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_lightning: Active Ability: Shake the orb to call forth a tremendous thunderstorm
Increases Lightning spell Potency by %1$s%%, reduces other element's spell Potency by 50%%
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_magic_lig: Acts as a mobile light source when in your Charm slot
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_mana_flas: This magically enchanted flask always refills itself over time
Must be used in the offhand, with a mana storing item in the mainhand
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_necromanc: Active Ability: Holding up the orb releases a deadly plague
Increases Necromancy spell Potency by %1$s%%, reduces other element's spell Potency by 50%%
This object of unknown origin is said to contain an archive about all spells created to date
Tapping into the knowledge of the Omnicron has revealed the spell - %1$s!
The cube doesn't have enough mana (%1$s required)
I should hold the cube in my main hand...
Requires an unknown spell in the offhand
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_power_orb: Grants +20%% spell potency for all spells, but increases mana costs by 20%%
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_prismatic: Prismatic Spray can be focused at a single target
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_progressi: The Knowledge Transfer spell transfers wand Progression experience from the source wand instead of Mana
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_reanimati: Grants a 15%% chance to reanimate slain undeads as skeletons
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_runic_ham: With this mythic hammer, all of your transmutated artefacts becomes Rings. Armour upgrade items always transmute into Crystal Silver Plating
Touching these scissors gives you the shivers, but its potent magic allows you to always transmute artefacts into Amulets or Belts. Armour upgrade items always transmute into Ethereal Crystalweave
Casting the Harvest spell also attempts to replant seeds from the inventory
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_shadow_bl: Allows the wearer to unleash the true potential of the Shadow Blade
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_sorcery_o: Active Ability: Shaking the orb releases a powerful shockwave
Increases Sorcery spell Potency by %1$s%%, reduces other element's spell Potency by 50%%
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_wand_upgr: Grants a 20%% chance to not use up Wand Upgrades on the Arcane Workbench when upgrading a wand
The Quill prevented the Wand Upgrade from being used up
item.ancientspellcraft\\:charm_philosoph: You've already used the Stone today.
The central symbol of alchemy, this legendary stone can be used to create alchemical Essence. Essence can be brewed into healing potions or used on iron to turn it into gold.
item.ancientspellcraft\\:alchemical_esse: Can be brewed into healing potions with water bottles or into regeneration potions if brewed from healing potions. Applying it on iron bars transmutes the metal to Gold.
The triumphant call of this horn inflicts fear and weakness in your enemies.
item.ancientspellcraft\\:cornucopia.desc: This magical horn of plenty refills itself with food each day
item.ancientspellcraft\\:cornucopia.empt: You've checked the Cornucopia but it was empty
item.ancientspellcraft\\:cornucopia.name: Cornucopia
item.ancientspellcraft\\:crystal_shard_e: These small elemental crystal shards can be combined into a whole crystal
item.ancientspellcraft\\:crystal_shard_f: These small elemental crystal shards can be combined into a whole crystal
item.ancientspellcraft\\:crystal_shard_h: These small elemental crystal shards can be combined into a whole crystal

item.ancientspellcraft\\:devoritium_arro: Arrows tipped with Devoritium inflict a temporary Magical Exhaustion, weakening or disabling the spellcasting ability of the target. It can also damage magical constructs
item.ancientspellcraft\\:devoritium_bomb: Devoritium Bombs can damage magical constructs and summons where they explode and leave a lingering anti-magic effect after impact, preventing any form of spellcasting
item.ancientspellcraft\\:devoritium_door: Devoritium Doors instantly absord the magical buffs and debuffs of entities passing through them
item.ancientspellcraft\\:devoritium_ingo: This dense metal seems to suppress any kind of magical powers
item.ancientspellcraft\\:devoritium_swor: Devoritim weapons and tools are capable of suppressing and absorbing magic, weakening the magical abilities of both the wielder of them and the target they hit. Its impossible to enchant this rare metal as applied enchantments are immediately absorbed
item.ancientspellcraft\\:enchanted_name_: Can be used to locate biomes with the Will o' Wisp Spell. Needs infusing with Magic Crystals at the Arcane Workbench
Can be used to locate biomes with the Will o' Wisp Spell. Rename it with an Anvil after a biome name
Needs to be used in the offhand together with the Will o' Wisp spell to locate a biome.
item.ancientspellcraft\\:head.generic.de: Equip this headgear in the Baubles inventory or by placing it on your hotbar if you don't have Baubles. Only one head-slot item may be equipped at once.
item.ancientspellcraft\\:head_curse.desc: Gain power for each curse you are inflicted with (+10%% Potency per Curse)
item.ancientspellcraft\\:head_curse.name: Crown of Corrupted Might
item.ancientspellcraft\\:head_fortune.de: Empowers your mine spell and the Conjured Pickaxe item with Fortune, based on spell potency
item.ancientspellcraft\\:head_merchant.d: Wizards agree to buy your scrolls
item.ancientspellcraft\\:head_shield.des: Significantly reduces the decay rate of the Wizard Shield effect
Magical light from the Magelight spell lingers for 30 seconds.
item.ancientspellcraft\\:ice_cream.desc: The true icing of Ice Magic, this delicious magical
item.ancientspellcraft\\:ice_cream.name: Ice Cream
item.ancientspellcraft\\:ice_shield.desc: Applies a Frostbite effect to attackers
item.ancientspellcraft\\:ice_shield.name: Ice Shield
item.ancientspellcraft\\:magic_shield.de: This ancient crystal shield casts a protective ward to defend its wielder while blocking.
item.ancientspellcraft\\:pensive.desc: The Pensive can store your experience in a liquid form.
Getting critically wounded sends you into a battle rage, enhancing your strength
item.ancientspellcraft\\:ring_blast.name: Blasting Ring
item.ancientspellcraft\\:ring_disenchant: Words of Unbinding purges the enchantments of the item in your offhand instead of affecting your wand
item.ancientspellcraft\\:ring_focus_crys: The ring's crystal intensifies the Arcane Beam, causing it to pass through its target and hit a secondary enemy
Arcane Magnetism only pulls items based on your offhand item
item.ancientspellcraft\\:ring_mana_trans: Allows the wearer to transfer mana to another player's wand while sneak-casting Knowledge Transfer
item.ancientspellcraft\\:ring_permanent_: Your Grow Self spell's effect is permanent
Your Shrink Self spell permanently reduces your size
item.ancientspellcraft\\:ring_poison_arr: Grants a 20%% chance to poison your targets with your arrows
item.ancientspellcraft\\:ring_power.desc: Grants +5%% spell potency for all spells, but increases mana costs by 5%%
item.ancientspellcraft\\:ring_power.name: Ring of Power
item.ancientspellcraft\\:ring_prismarine: Extinguishes its wearer if it is burning.
Makes all of your conjured quicksand two blocks deep
item.ancientspellcraft\\:ring_range.name: Loop of Reach
Grants a 20%% chance to reclaim the wand upgrade which is being removed by the Words of Unbinding spell

item.ancientspellcraft\\:soulbound_upgra: Upgrades a wand to make it stay in the player inventory after death
item.ancientspellcraft\\:sphere_cognizan: This magical crystal ball can help you understanding various aspects of unknown spell books or researching unknown Stone Tablets
item.ancientspellcraft\\:stone_fist.name: Stone Fist
item.ancientspellcraft\\:stone_tablet.de: These ancient relics were chiseled in the language of the ancients, little is known about these long-lost dialects. Perhaps studying it with a Sphere of Cognizance would help?
item.ancientspellcraft\\:stone_tablet_gr: These ancient relics were chiseled in the language of the ancients, little is known about these long-lost dialects. Perhaps studying it with a Sphere of Cognizance would help?
item.ancientspellcraft\\:stone_tablet_la: These ancient relics were chiseled in the language of the ancients, little is known about these long-lost dialects. Perhaps studying it with a Sphere of Cognizance would help?
item.ancientspellcraft\\:stone_tablet_sm: A small stone tablet, containing text written in a long forgotten language
These ancient relics were chiseled in the language of the ancients, little is known about these long-lost dialects. Perhaps studying it with a Sphere of Cognizance would help?
item.ancientspellcraft\\:transmutation_s: This scroll holds a powerful magic which can transmute many magical items into different objects
Right-click for 3 seconds while holding this scroll to transmute the item in your offhand into a different object.
You must cast the scroll continuously for 3 seconds to cast transmutation
This transmutation would result in the same item!
item.ancientspellcraft\\:transmutation.n: You must hold an item in your offhand which can be transmuted.
Identifies an unknown spell book, scroll or ritual book
potion.ancientspellcraft\\:magical_exhau: Your attempt to cast the spell failed
relic_type.enchantment.instruction: Hold the table in your main hand and an item in your other hand for 6 seconds to enchant it
relic_type.incantation.instruction: Hold the table for 6 seconds to shatter it and release the stored Incantation
relic_type.power.instruction: Hold the table for 6 seconds to shatter it and release the stored Power
relic_type.spell.instruction: Spells can be crafted with the Scribing Desk
ritual.ancientspellcraft\\:arcane_barrie:
Conjures an impenetrable magical barrier which cannot be entered by non-allied creatures. This ritual requires an 5x5 large platform of some specific materials to begin. 
 The material of the platform determines the size of the barrier. 
Lapis Block: 10 blocks radius
Magic Crystal Block: 20 blocks radius
Emerald Block: 25 blocks radius
Gold Block: 30 blocks radius
Diamon Block: 35 blocks radius.
 To begin the ritual, throw a Grand Magic crystal into the centerpiece rune.
ritual.ancientspellcraft\\:bonfire.desc: This ritual binds the caster's soul to the location where the ritual is performed, causing their future resurrections to happen in that very place.
ritual.ancientspellcraft\\:condensing.de: Ambient magic is everywhere, but tapping this potent resource is only possible with the most delicate magical rituals. The Ritual of Condensing allows a wizard to condense ambient magic and grow magical crystals and crystal shards. A Wand Condensing Upgrade scroll is required at the centerpiece of the ritual to begin this effect. After that, a Magic Crystal Shard or Magic Crystal can be placed in the center to grow it, but growing crystals can take several days.
ritual.ancientspellcraft\\:forest.desc: This ritual was worthy of respect from the Druids and Earth Mages of the old ages for being capable of instantly growing large forests where it was performed. The only material component required after drawing the runic pattern is a young sapling of a tree. After dropping the sapling on the center piece rune, a forest of the sapling's wood type emerges from the soil.
The Ritual of Rejuvenation is a powerful restorative spell which can mend even the largest wounds of any living creature in its effect radius within a matter of seconds. The revitalizing effects of the ritual can immediately cure Withering, Poison and Nausea.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:antimagic_fiel: Creates an anti-magic field which disturbs any spellcasts.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:aquatic_agilit: Magically enchant your movement inside water to swim like a fish.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:arcane_aegis.d: The complete incantation of the shielding ward, deflects most projectiles. Requires to hold a wand with mana.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:arcane_augment: Increases the blast and range of your next non-metamagic spell by channelling a greater amount of magical force into it.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:arcane_beam.de: Channels an instant beam of highly intense magical energy.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:arcane_magneti: Pulls all nearby items towards the caster.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:armageddon.des: Unleash the power of fire to destroy your enemies and the landscape around you.
Magically imbues your arrows to fly further and deal more damage.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:astral_project: Allows the caster's spirit to enter the astral dimension to scout the nearby area.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:attire_alterat: Stores your current armor set in a magical pocket and allows quickly swapping armor.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:blockweaving.d: Magically places block from your offhand by selecting the start position with first cast and end position with second cast.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:blockweaving.f: Remembered the first position at %s, %s, %s. Cast again to place blocks.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:blockweaving.o: This spell requires a placeable block in the offhand.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:bubble_head.de: Forms a water bubble around the caster's health while underwater, the bubble pops from any source damage
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:bulwark.desc: Casts a protective ward on the caster which has a greater chance to deflect physical and magical projectiles. Requires to hold a wand with mana.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:burrow.desc: Allows the caster to burrow into the ground. The mushroom will disappear after 2 minutes.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:burrow.hard_ma: The material below you is too hard to dig.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:burrow.y_limit: You can't dig deeper with this spell.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:call_of_the_pa: Summon a pack of wolves to aid you in battle.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:candlelight.de: Conjures a flickering candlelight above the caster, providing a source of light.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:celerity.desc: Grants the caster and all nearby allies increased movement speed for 45 seconds.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:channel_effect: Allows you to cast Buff spells on others instead of yourself. Channel Effect needs to be in your main hand to cast and the Buff needs to be in your offhand.
You must hold a scroll or a wand with a selected spell in your other hand
The spellcasting item doesn't have enough mana
Ancient writings says this technique was used by wizards of older civilizations to unite their powers and perform miracles.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:conduit.desc: Allows transferring Mana between wands. Requires the target wand to be in the offhand.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:conduit.no_wan: Requires a wand in both hands.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:conjure_fishin: Conjures a Spectral Fishing rod. Potency increases the level and number of enchantments it has.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:conjure_shadow: Conjures a withering Shadow Blade from the Underworld.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:conjure_shield: Creates spectral shield which can be used for blocking physical attacks. The shield lasts for 60 seconds.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:conjure_shovel: Creates a spectral shovel of equal strength to an iron shovel that lasts for 60 seconds.
Conjures a water source block where the caster targets. Can also fill water bottles and buckets in the offhand.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:contingency_cr: This Contingency spell causes your next spell to be released when your health goes below 25%%. Cast a spell after the Contingency to store it.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:contingency_da: This Contingency spell causes your next spell to be released when you take damage. Cast a spell after the Contingency to store it.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:contingency_de: This Contingency spell causes your next spell to be released at death. Cast a spell after the Contingency to store it.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:contingency_dr: This Contingency spell causes your next spell to be released when you are drowning. Cast a spell after the Contingency to store it.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:contingency_fa: This Contingency spell causes your next spell to be released when you fall from a high place. Cast a spell after the Contingency to store it.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:contingency_fi: This Contingency spell causes your next spell to be released when you take fire damage. Cast a spell after the Contingency to store it.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:contingency_ho: This Contingency spell causes your next spell to be released when an enemy casts a hostile spell nearby. Cast a spell after the Contingency to store it.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:contingency_im: This Contingency spell causes your next spell to be released when you are immobilized by a magica effect. Cast a spell after the Contingency to store it.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:continuity_cha: Increases the duration of your next non-metamagic spell
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:covenant.desc: By calling upon the ancient pledge of the wizard order, you can request a wizard to help you in fighting the evil
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:create_igloo.d: Creates a snow igloo where the caster is pointing. Must be casted downwards
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:cryostasis.des: Encases the caster in a nigh impenetrable solid ice, rendering it unable to move. Regenerates live force during cryostasis.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:crystal_mine.d: Conjure a Crystal Mine with the initial cast, detonate it with the second cast.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:curse_armor.de: Applies a random Curse to a piece of the target's armor.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:curse_of_death: Invoke Death, pure demise,\neliminate any foe on third sunrise
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:curse_of_ender: Suddenly you feel that you are not a part of this world anymore, you have fear of the water and the sun annoys you.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:curse_temporal: Imprisoned in time the warlock sits,\nfrozen in fear, of the Reset. Those who test a sorcerers might, will experience temporal blight, shall go back to where and when they\n stood, once the sun begins to set
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:curse_ward.des: Casts a magical ward on the caster for two minutes which can absorb curses. Absorbing a curse halves the remaning duration of the ward.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:dimensional_an: Binds the target to this realm, preventing any kind of teleportation, phase-shifting or interdimensional traveling.
A powerful magical energy drags you back to this realm.
A powerful magical energy binds you to this place and prevents teleporting!
A powerful magical energy binds you to this place and prevents casting the spell!
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:dispel_greater: Dispels greater magical constructs and rojectiles up to Advanced tier, banishes summons and removes all beneficial effects from an enemy
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:dispel_item_cu: Removes a Curse from an item in the offhand or an armor piece of the caster.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:dispel_lesser_: Dispels weaker magical constructs and projectiles up to Apprentice tier, or a beneficial buff when hitting an enemy
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:drought.desc:
Shrivel and shrink,
wither and wilt,
waste away
and ebb of life,
green be grey
and dust become.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:eagle_eye.desc: Allows the caster to get a high altitude view of the nearby area.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:eagle_eye.indo: This spell only works with a clear view to the sky
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:essence_extrac: Channel a magically potent object to drain the arcane essence out of it. Powerful objects require an Astral Diamond as a vessel
Extracting the magical essence from this block will require an Astral Diamond in my offhand
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:extinguish.des: Extinguishes nearly burning blocks and entities, including the caster. Grants a temporary fire resistance for the caster if burning. Radius increases with wand Blast Upgrades.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:eye_of_the_sto: Ride the storm to overcome your enemies
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:fairy_ring.des: Creates a ring of magical mushrooms around the caster
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:farsight.desc: Magically augments your vision to see far
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:feather_fall.d: Slows down your falling speed by charging the air below you with magical energy
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:fimbulwinter.d: Unleash the power of the great frost to decimate your enemies.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:fire_ant_swarm: Summons a Fire Ant Volcano from the Nether
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:firewall.desc: Conjures a wall of flame where the caster is pointing.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:flint_shard.de: Fires a flint shard in the direction you are pointing which damages its target.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:forcefend.desc: Redirects approaching projectiles at nearby enemies.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:frost_nova.des: Releases a ring of ice shards after two seconds of channeling
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:grow_self.desc: Allows you to become a giant for a short amount of time. Growing has various side effects like an increased jump height, attack speed, increased health and damage ...
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:harvest.desc: Harvests all grown crops near the caster. Also attempts to plant them if the player has seeds.
Shoots a Healing Heart which restores one heart to living targets and deals one heart damage to undeads.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:hellgate.desc: Mastering the secrets of fire opens many doors of opportunity...
Calls your last mount to you even from afar with a magical whistle
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:ice_cream.desc: Allows the caster to conjure some delicious Ice Cream. The Ice Cream melts after 20 seconds.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:ice_shield.des: Creates a shield of enchanted ice which applies a Frostbite effect to attackers and explodes when it breaks, freezing enemies
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:ice_tower.desc: Creates a Tower of Ice of enchanted snow and ice which never melts. Must be casted downwards
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:ice_tower.no_r: Not enough free space for the ice tower
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:intensifying_f: By channelling a greater amount of magical energy and focusing it to a smaller scale, increases your next spell's Potency
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:lava_vision.de: Allows the caster to see through lava clearly.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:living_comet.d: Become fire itself and unleash a devastating attack from above at your enemies
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:magelight.desc: Conjures a hovering light source above the caster
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:magma_shell.de: Raises a protective sphere of magma blocks around the caster. The magma disappears over time.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:molten_earth.d: Turns the land into magma where you are pointing on the ground. The magma disappears after 45 seconds.
Increases the caster's movement speed inside lava.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:mana_flare.des: Channels your wand with the target's, burning out mana from both.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:mana_vortex.de: Hurl a vortex of pure energy that damages enemies in its path
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:martyr.desc: Take the burden of all harm so that another can survive.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:magma_wall.des: Creates a wall of magma where you are pointing on the ground. The wall disappears after 45 seconds.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:mass_growth.de: Shoots a projectile of resizing magic in the direction you are pointing, temporarily increasing the size of all targets where the projectile impacts.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:mass_shrink.de: Shoots a projectile of resizing magic in the direction you are pointing, temporarily reducing the size of all targets where the projectile impacts.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:metamagic_proj: Changes the shape of your next spell to a projectile form. \n(Not every spell can be casted as a projectile.)
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:might_and_magi: Channel all your magical powers into your body, temporary enhancing your health and strength in exchange for your magic
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:mushroom_fores: Allows the caster to conjure a forest of mushrooms
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:permagrowth.de: Permanently increases the size of a targeted non-player entity.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:permashrink.de: Permanently reduces the size of a targeted non-player entity.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:pocket_dimensi: After channeling for 3 seconds, teleports the caster to its own pocket dimension.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:prismatic_spra: Shoots out 7 different rays of light by splitting magic into its elemental components, each ray has a different effect on targets
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:projectile_war: Casts a protective ward on the caster which has some chance deflect physical projectiles. Requires to hold a wand with mana
Commands all of your nearby summoned creatures with your wand, attacking the selected target, calling them back to you or marching to a position.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:pyrokinesis.de: Conjure flames inside your enemy by focusing your will at it.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:quicksand_ring: Temporarily turns the land around the caster into quicksand.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:raise_skeleton: Arise, wizards of ancient civilizations and follow my bidding
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:regrowth.desc: Imbues yourself or the target (sneak cast) with a natural regenerative energy
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:sacred_mace.de: Allows the caster to summon the legendary Sacred Mace
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:shrink_self.de: Allows you to become tiny for a short amount of time. Shrinking has various side effects like being immune to fall damage, increased movement speed, reduced attack damage ...
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:silencing_sigi: Places a sigil which magically silences all sound around it in a 5 block radius
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:skull_sentinel: Enchants a skull on the ground to ward an area. The skull shrieks if an entity enters the area
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:soul_scorch.de: By condensing the most intense flames at your target, you can cripple its healing and regeneration, reducing the efficiency of any healing effect by 50%% for 30 seconds.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:spirit_ward.de: Places a circular ward around the caster that prevents undeads from entering it.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:sporelings_aid: Summons a combat mushroom where you are pointing. Sneak-casting summons a beneficial mushroom instead. The mushroom will disappear after 2 minutes.
Charges your weapon with the power of lightning, dealing shock damage to your enemies
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:stone_fist.des: Transforms the hand of the caster into a more durable variant of stonefist
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:stone_fist.ful: Your main hand must be empty!
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:stone_fist.wro: Must be casted from the offhand!
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:stone_punch.de: Transforms the hand of the caster into a magical stone which lasts for two hits.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:stone_punch.fu: Your main hand must be empty!
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:stone_punch.wr: Must be casted from the offhand!
Weaken the boundaries between the spirit realm and yours to increase the lifetime of your summons and anchor them to this world.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:summon_boat.de: Summon a boat where the caster is pointing
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:summon_fire_an: Summons a Fire Ant to fight for you. The Fire Ant will disappear after 30 seconds or if it is killed.
Summons a spider to fight for you. The spider will disappear after 30 seconds or if it is killed.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:summon_spirit_: Summons a permanent Spirit Bear companion. The Spirit Bear will only disappear if it is killed, or you can dismiss it by shift-right-clicking on it with any wand.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:suppression.de: Temporarily weakens the magical abilities of the target
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:tameanimal.des: You must follow me, said the Earth Wizard, and the animals of the forest obeyed.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:time_knot.desc: The end is the beginning and the beginning is the end
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:transference.d: Transfers a random positive potion effect to the target. Potency increases the number of effects that are transferred.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:transportation: Only masters of Sorcery can unlock the true power of Transportation Stones and open Transportation Portals.
The target location is too close
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:unholy_allianc: Dominate over all the elements through the mystic art of Necromancy
Allows the caster and nearby entitites (if not sneak-casted) to move across any liquid surfaces as if they were solid
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:weakness.desc: Weakens the target's strength, rendering them less effective in close combat for 60 seconds.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:wild_sporeling: Summons a random, wild combat mushroom where you are pointing. The mushroom will disappear after 25 seconds.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:will_o_wisp.de:
Ask of the spirits to seek and find,
Enchant the tag to name and bind,
Wisp will show where thy desire be,
Follow along and there it be!
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:will_o_wisp.in: Biome name in the Biome Tag is not a valid.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:will_o_wisp.no: The Wisp needs an Biome Tag in the offhand first, which is named after a biome with an anvil.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:will_o_wisp.se: The Wisp is moving towards the %s biome...
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:will_o_wisp.ta: The Biome Tag first needs to be named to a biome with an anvil.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:will_o_wisp.tr: The /listbiomes command can be used to list all the valid biome names
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:will_o_wisp.no: This spell only works in the Overworld
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:will_o_wisp.se: The wisp is searching for the biome...
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:will_o_wisp.ta: Biome is too far away, use wand Range Upgrades can increase the search radius.
Allows the caster to charge up a potent shield which can deflect any damage. The shield quickly decays while not being charged.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:words_of_unbin: Removes a random wand upgrade from the wand which casts this spell. You can control which upgrade is being removed if you hold the upgrade's scroll in your offhand.
You must cast this spell with a Wand.
You should hold an enchanted item in your offhand to disenchant it".
You must cast this spell with a Wand which has at least one upgrade to remove.
Turns the targeted Villager into a Zombie Villager.\n\n„Death is only the beginning...”
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:swamp.desc: Temporarily converts the area near you into a swampland
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:conjure_greate: Conjures a Greater Sentry where you are pointing. The Sentry disappears after 60 seconds.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:conjure_lesser: Conjures a Lesser Sentry where you are pointing. The Lesser Sentry disappears after 60 seconds.
spell.ancientspellcraft\\:summon_quicksa: Conjures a patch of quicksand where you are pointing. The quicksand disappears after 45 seconds.
tile.ancientspellcraft\\:devoritium_bloc: This darkish metal block seems to suppress any forms of magic when stepped on
tile.ancientspellcraft\\:quicksand.name: Quicksand
tile.ancientspellcraft\\:scribing_desk.d: You can recreate ancient spells at the Scribing Desk with the help of a researched Stone Tablet if the tablet contains a spell
tooltip.ancientspellcraft\\:missing_arte: This item is disabled because you don't have the ArtemisLib mod installed!
This spell is disabled because you don't have the ArtemisLib mod installed!
